attributes.action: lower the legal paid working age to 14
attributes.additional_details: As well as that, i think this opportunity would encourage teenagers to provide for them self as they are always wanting the next thing that is trending due to social influences.Finally anther thing that i believe is one of the most crucial benefits, is that teenagers would be encouraged to work instead of joining in with bad behaviour and joining gangs.
attributes.background: Currently, the legal paid working age is 16, however i believe the required age should be lowered to 14 because many teenagers rely on their parents/careers who work and in result of that this, teenagers tend to not become every independent.

rejection.details:
It is already legal for 14 year olds to work within certain limits. We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

https://www.gov.uk/child-employment/restrictions-on-child-employment

You could start a new petition if you would like these rules to be changed.
